data.text: Mafarisayo wangi na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso iwalawile Yerusalemu, wetingana hambele ha Yesu.
Wawona iwanang'ina wake wamwenga wakuja ichijo bila kwohopfugha ghamoko ghawo.
Mafarisayo na Wayahudi wose ng'awakuja bae ichijo mbaka wahopfughe ghamoko ghawo mbaka mne pfipfughumu, tsawakinda ichihendo cha iwabala wawo.
Hawolawa kusoko ng'awakuja ichinu chochose mbaka wachihopfughe. Pfipfila tsawakinda ipfihendo pfingi ka kuhopfugha ipfikombe, ghamabigha na pfiha.
Apfo awala Mafarisayo na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wamghutsa Yesu, “Ebali iwanang'ina wako ng'awokinda bae ipfihendo pfa iwabala, ila wakuja kwa ghamoko ghehile?”
Yesu kawedika, “Isaya tsakatabili pfinoghile kuna mwemwe, mwemwe iwang'enye, ka pfandike.
Wonitamanila hela,
“Mleka ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu,
Kuya kawalongela, “Pfinogha! Mna inzila inoghile ya kulema ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu ili mkinde ipfihendo pfenu.
Musa tsakalonga, ‘Uwahulike aba wako na mai wako,’ na ‘Imunu wowose iyomligha aba wake au mai wake katsokufa.’
Lekeni mwemwe mwolangulitsa, ka imunu kana ichinu cha kumwapfila aba wake au mai wake lekeni kolonga, ‘Ichinu achi Koribani’ mana yake, nzawadi kwe Imulungu,
apfo ng'obamighwa keli kumwapfila aba wake au mai wake.
Apfo mwoibetsa imbuli ye Imulungu kwe ipfihendo pfenu pfambokele. Na mwotenda ipfinu pfingi ka apfo.”
Kuya Yesu kalikema keli kingili lila lye iwanu, kawalongela, “Mnitegheletse mwemwe wose, mmanye.
Kuduhu ichinu ichikwingila mghati mwe imunu kulawa kunze ichidaha kumtenda yehe. Lekeni ichilawa mghati mwe imunu, acho chomtenda imunu yehe.
Imunu yane ghamaghutwi gha kuhulika na yahulike.”
Halilekile kingili lye iwanu na kwingila mng'anda, iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa mana ye imbuli ayo.
Yesu kawalongela, “Apfi namwe mwahela tsimbutsi? Angu ng'ammanya bae ka kuduhu ichinu ichimwingila imunu kulawa kunze chimtende yehe?
Kwaapfila ng'achimwingila bae mne ghumoyo ila chakwingila munda, kuya cholawa kunze kwe lukuli lwake.” Kwa ukulonga apfi, Yesu kapfitenda ipfijo pfose “pfinogha.”
Kaghendelela kulonga, “Ichinu ichimlawa imunu, acho chomtenda yehe.
Kwaapfila mne ghumoyo ghwe imunu, gholawa mawatso ghehile, utsinzi, ubapfi, ukukoma, dong'o,
ughoni, ughutsu, ufisadi, chepfu, maligho, kwighoda, chidandali ne ubotsi.
Agho ghose ghehile gholawa mghati mwe imunu, nagho ghomtenda imunu yehe.”
Yesu kalawa hanu aho, kaghenda mne ghumji ghwa Tiro. Ako kengila mne ing'anda na ng'abamile bae imunu wowose amanye, lekeni ng'adahile bae kwipfisa.
Ipinga yumwe iyakalile ne imwana pinga yane ichinyamkela, kahulika mbuli tsa Yesu. Apfo kamghendela, kamghwila mmaghulu mwake.
Ipinga ayo tsakakala Mgiriki, iyelekighwe mne ghumji ghwa Sirofoinike. Kamlomba Yesu amlapfe mwanaghe ichinyamkela.
Lekeni Yesu kamwidika, “Tanu waleke iwana weghute. Ng'apfinoghile bae kusola ichijo che iwana na kuwasila wambwa.”
Ipinga ayo kamwidika, “Imtwatsa, lekeni hata wambwa iwali hasi mwe imetsa wakuja ipfijo pfawalekile iwana.”
Yesu kamlongela ipinga yula, “Kwa apfo pfawidike, uke ukaye, ichinyamkela kamlawa imwanagho.”
Apfo ipinga yula koka ukaye, kampfika imwanaghe kawasa mne lusatsi na ichinyamkela kamlawa.
Kuya Yesu koka mne ghumji ghwa Tiro, kaghenda Galilaya kwa kubitila Sidoni na mne ghumji ghwa Dekapoli.
Iwanu wangi wamghalila imunu chitsiwi na iyang'adahile bae ukulonga pfinoghile, wamlomba Yesu amwikile ghamoko imunu ayo.
Apfo Yesu kamseghetsa imunu ayo hambali ne iwanu. Keka pfidole pfake mne ghamaghutwi ghe imunu ayo. Kuya kabwalula ghamate na kaludonza lulimi lwake.
Yesu kalola kulanga, kahumula kwe ingupfu, kamlongela imunu ayo, “Epfata!” (mana yake, “Ghubuka!”).
Bahala ghamaghutwi ghe imunu yula ghaghubuka, lulimi lwake luleghela, kandusa kulonga pfinoghile.
Kuya Yesu kawalaghitsa waleke kumlongela imunu wowose. Lekeni ka pfayaghendelele kuwaghoma, waghendelela kulalatsa mbuli ayo.
Iwanu wakangawala ghendo. Walonga, “Katenda ghoya chila ichinu. Hata pfitsiwi kowatenda wahulike, na pfibubu walonge!”
